review_data.title: A Guildhall for Reunions
review_data.content: The Saffran Guild has been been serving food on these premisses for over 600 years. It was - and still is - the active guildhall of Zurich merchants, doctors, and many more specialized trades. The original (17th century) interior of the guildhall has been carfully...More

review_data.title: Gediegenes Zunfthaus an der Limmat
review_data.content: Das Zunfthaus zur Saffran ist ein weiteres gediegenes Zunfthaus an der Limmat. Es hat einen wunderschönen Zunftsaal mit hervorragender Küche.

review_data.title: Geschäftsessen

review_data.title: Classical Guild House on the Limmat Quai
review_data.content: I was here recently for a business lunch and had the menu fish - it was amazing and cooked to perfection. Lovely place for lunch or dinner. They also do events - a birthday party here many years ago.

review_data.title: disappointment

review_data.title: Great Atmosphere: Mediocre Dinner
review_data.content: This is a beautiful old historic building, upstairs restaurant, often used for special events. The fixed price menu had limited options and was a disappointment.

review_data.title: Charming place with palpable history
review_data.content: We attended an organised stand-up dinner in the event hall on the first floor. The decoration is absolutely marvelous and the food and the wine serve were exquisite.
